```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
q <- read.table("data/maf_0.05/K_3_rep_1/output.qopt")

barplot(t(q),
        col = c("darkgrey",
                "lightgrey",
                "black"),
        space = 0,
        border = NA,
        xlab = "Individuals",
        ylab = "Admixture proportions for K = 3, rep 1")
```
